lines.text: As you get up and start walking away, the herald stands up and begins walking towards the other side of the anvil.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I walk really quickly.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's like speedily running granny into the crowd and as you get--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Drop disguise.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Drop disguise-- in the middle of the crowd?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, no, I zoom around the corner.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Still in your disguise as you're charging into the crowd, behind you, you hear a voice (scream). "That old woman! Find her!" There's screaming and you hear this ruckus as people around start looking behind at the shouting sound as you dart around the corner. Drop disguise and as you do, you can now see the herald and the two keepers of the temple are now pushing through the crowd, looking, searching like, "Has anyone seen an old woman?" Is describing you as best they can and it looks like there's a bit of commotion going on. As you begin to disperse into the crowd, making your way--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I take a bite of my caramel apple, and I go walking down.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You hear a crunch sound and your hand shakes for a second and you look down and a mysterious secondary bite was taken out of the apple.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (groaning)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're making out with your god? Gross.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They have a special relationship. While this is happening, you head to the military stand, you said? Anybody going with Beau?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I'll go.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I also follow.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys approach at this point towards the Soldier Spear. You see this larger platform in the middle of the Pentamarket. There you see the central military figures wearing ornamental armor with a top knot. There is a table set up there with these benches and you can see there are two burly men, one who is this hairy, heavy thick woodsman type who is wearing a leather apron and--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: A Sam Riegel-type.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No? All right, very well. Anyone else?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, what's up?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, we are having a contest to see who here is the strongest."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Cool. Who's the strongest?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, so far, it's that gentleman." Points over to the heavy, burly fellow who's off to the side. He's currently flexing and cracking his wrist.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: If you win, do you have to stick around and arm wrestle a whole bunch of people because you're suddenly the best? I don't want to dedicate more time to this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I mean, you don't have to."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do I still get to be the best though if this guy sticks around and just keeps going?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Probably, but don't be surprised if other contenders start following you around the town to "try and take your title."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This is like the King of Kong.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is this really that important to you guys? Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Not to us, but it's a fun place to display your skill and talent. Plus, we're always looking "for some fine young soldiers to come and join us out there on the fields. To take down the "Xhorhasian evils and keep all these fine folks here well taken care of."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: For a gold a day?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yeah."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Buying people's loyalty for a gold a day?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Wow.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sorry, I just-- all right. (sighs) Heard something about a Victory Pit. Is this the Victory Pit?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She's the worst.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He goes, "No, you're not--" Points over and that large forum building, that circular forum building that you saw that now the crowd's starting to wash into that had been closed off previous weeks, he goes, "That, that is the Victory Pit. That will be happening in a few "hours, but you're welcome to compete here if you're feeling so feisty."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, sure.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "What's your name?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Beau.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Ah. Recruiter Leopold Wanstiker. Pleasure to meet you."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Person Beau. Nice to meet you. What is it? Leopold Sydney?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: W-A-N-S-T-I-K-E-R.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: This is top knot dude?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Top knot guy, yep.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's the wang.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "He's a strong fellow. Good luck." He sits down.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to fail this miserably.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sits down at his stool, puts his meaty arm out with the fingers and goes--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Good to meet you, Kendall.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Sure."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ugh, it's sweaty.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is sweaty.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Calm your mind. Just steel your mind.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, god.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Leopold goes, "One, two, three!" Go ahead and make a strength check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, god, just--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Those knuckle hairs are like fly legs.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Just a check?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep. Just a d20, add your strength modifier.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Five.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Five. At that center point, you immediately begin to give to his grasp. You see this slight grin begin to curl underneath his wiry beard as his arm begins to push you close to the edge of the table. Make another strength check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Dig in!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: A critter gave me this. They said it was lucky. It's not that lucky. 12.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 12. With that (slams) onto the table. You lose.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ow!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Knuckles a little bruised from the slam. He gets up and is like, "Ha!"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That was worth following around for.

lines.name: TRAVIS, TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Thought you were going to beat him.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm very slippery, I'm not-- I want to do that Victory Pit thing, though.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well done though, Beau. Well done. Here." He hands you a small piece of parchment that's rolled up and goes, "This is information about, if you'd be so interested, in coming and joining the "Righteous Brand."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Audition for our acapella group.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Kingsman.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You can find us at the Marrow Keeps of the Righteous Brand on the outskirts of the northern "end of Zadash, should you be so interested."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Marrow Keeps?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We've heard of that before.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Mm-hmm.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is in the area of the Signet Wall which is the military district of the city.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Anyone else?" Another gentleman raises his hand and gets up on stage and they begin to do a showdown. The two of them begin to go back and forth. However, that same beastly figure, Kendall, still manages to, defeat the guy and send him to the table, get up again and "Ha!" Then at some point, shortly thereafter, Leopold goes, "Ah, he returns! He returns! (chuckling) Gunther Prast, "our finest soldier here in the city, would like to challenge the current standing contender." You watch now as this massive behemoth of a man, like the Mountain from Game of Thrones, about seven foot, 350 pounds guy wearing the Righteous Brand silver and red armor, gets up onto the stage (heavy steps). Clean-shaven, except for this perpetual five o'clock shadow that doesn't seem to leave his square jaw, his hair is trimmed super short and you see the receding hairline curling back into a widow's peak. Sits on the table, puts his arm out there and you can see the huntsman, Kendall, for the first time, lose his cool. You watch as the two of them grasp together and they're going to begin to roll off.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What's going on?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Beau lost.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Beau lost at arm wrestling?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You watch as the hands tighten and with that, Gunther begins to twist the arm, further down, further down. You can see, the huntsman character is starting to grimace.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Come on, Gunther.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Grasps his hand and rubs his fingers, and darts off the stage, seemingly shamed in front of a crowd of people. Everyone's like, "Oh!" There's now probably about 30-40 people who watched that last match.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Go Gunther!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Which one did you do the arm wrestling with, Beau?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Have we met Gunther before? Is he human?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He looks human. He's just huge.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You should take a shot at that.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Are you going to take a shot at this, Fjord?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (coughing) Me?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, you're stronger than me, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're very big and strong, Fjord!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, he's really not.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. You know.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: At the very least, you have a lot to prove.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Caleb is going to sneak off while everybody is involved with this.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's not good to arm wrestle 30 minutes after eating a caramel apple.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, I never heard that one before.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yasha, you should do it. You're very strong.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Mm-hmm. You had a candied apple. You should be fine.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Extra strong? Because of the candied apple.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Your rat diet.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I mean, Beau is-- No, he didn't.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, I mean, from in your past.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Good constitution. Yeah, come on. Let them know.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do it, Yasha!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Are you doing any more of the wrestling with the arms?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Leopold is looking over the crowd, goes, "Would you like to try your hand at our finest warrior?"

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Come on up, Miss--"

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: (whispers) Yasha.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Hello.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Hello." Sits down, puts his elbow on the table with a heavy slam.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Grasps you. Both your arms--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (yelling) Use your feminine wiles!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, I wouldn't-- Oh.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I shake my hair a little.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yasha, don't hold back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's taking a moment and looking you over, like he's studying something.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I try not to make eye contact.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's trying to make eye contact. Moving around.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Away.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (yelling) Her hair's so beautiful. Woo!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't think that's helping.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Don't look at him.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's not a beauty contest.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As Leopold is talking up this whole this whole, "All right, come watch now! Here is our "finest--" and it fades away in the background as Gunther, who's leaning forward now, says "Interesting styling. I've seen it before."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: What do you mean?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You're not from around here, are you?"

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Well, neither are you. What does that have to do with anything?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (cheering)

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: (cheering)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Natural 20. No joke. No joke. Right there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Blood is everywhere.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Fist of the North Star!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Beautiful. Beautiful. Mwah.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: This was thanks to Gil. Shit! What does that mean?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The whole crowd goes "Ooh!" Everything gets really tense and quiet as you're both flexing. At this point now, you do make eye contact. As the anger is built up inside you. Make another strength check.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Fuck.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are you still raging?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, she hasn't raged yet.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Can I rage? I don't know if I can do that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not on this roll you can't, because you already rolled for it. Next time you can.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Seven.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Seven. You feel yourself giving way, your arm going further back towards the table. You see this grin across his face. His breath smells of mildewed bread and alcohol. It wafts past your nose. Roll a strength check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Matt, may I cast Message and send a message to Gunther?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Gunther, yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to quickly say: Kendall is getting to second base with your wife right now! Do not respond to this message! (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You get to roll another strength check with advantage.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay. How far away is everybody from us?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're about five feet from you.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh shit. Okay. Never mind.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh shit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: With advantage!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay, okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You get to roll again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Because you are raging.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As he's pushing you down towards the table, you muster up another breath of strength from inside. With that, you push him back to the center. You're both at even keel. Roll again.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: With advantage?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With advantage.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: This is very stressful. Okay. 21.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (grunt) He starts giving ground, the sweat now beading across his forehead. His nostrils are flaring. That horrible smell of his breath is coming in bigger and more constant waves as he starts to (grunt). He looks up from his grip, up into your eyes once more. Roll again.

lines.name: SAM, LAURA
lines.text: Finish him!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay. Oh shit. (stammering) I can't do math right nowbecause I'm stressed. 14.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're losing ground. You're losing ground! Roll again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right up at the center. Roll again! The crowd is going wild right now.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh no.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Leopold's like leaning in now, watching this happen.

lines.name: MARISHA, LAURA
lines.text: (chanting) Yasha! Yasha!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is going back and forth, back and forth. (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Put him in the body bag!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Give him the chair!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM, LAURA
lines.text: Advantage!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Rolled an 18. You guys are right there again. At the fulcrum point. The crowd is starting to go completely breathless at this point. It's back and forth. Roll again.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: One of them is going to have exhaustion soon, I know it!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's starting to breathe really heavy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 21. You push him back again. You can see now, the muscles are straining and popping, the veins are bulging. His breaths are getting heavier, his shoulder is looking like it's almost dislodging as he's using his torso to push against it. Roll once more.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Jester! Should I shoot him?.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (yelling) No! No! No! Rip his arm off, Yasha! Don't shoot him!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay. 19.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He immediately stands up and starts shaking his arm at that point.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: (cheering)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Leopold goes, "Amazing show. Yasha!" and he runs up behind you and catches up to you. As you step off the stage, he steps off with you. Goes "I'm sorry to bother you, Yasha. That was an "incredible-- Have you any interest in all at joining the ranks of the Righteous Brand?"

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: No.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh. Well, think about it." He goes into the small satchel and pulls out at rolled piece of paper, and says "It's a fantastic thing you would do for the Empire if everyone here-- You look like "a fine soldier and based on your skills up there you'd be a great help on the front line."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh. I don't. Okay. I will take this with me. I don't like groups of people working together for a cause. I will take it with me. I walk away.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did she win anything? Did she get a prize?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Strangely enough, there is no prize for this. There is no buy-in. It's merely for the bragging rights of the presentation. It's a presentory--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (yelling) Lame!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Wow.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's a really shitty prize, though.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: What does it-- did you look at it yet?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I bet yours says, "Please don't ever contact us again."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, what dicks!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, it talks about--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Can you read it for me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It says--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you read it-- (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, I think this is for Marisha.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do that, speak at the same time-- hear ye hear ye.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No. It speaks of the Righteous Brand and talks about all of the wonderful possibilities for glory. It's housing and gear provided, it's working in a good teamwork environment to protect the people of the Empire. It has opportunities to rise through the ranks and to become--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's propaganda.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It talks about-- it pays one gold a day at start, with possibility of raises from there. The training is in Bladegarden and after a period of training there, it's three years minimum service in the military and then you can decide to stay or not. It goes into a small print and says like "desertion is illegal and brings imprisonment and fines."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The ushe.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: A gold a day, that's pretty good. Right? Is it?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I mean, if you're only training, they send you to the frontline and it's questionable.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think I've literally made 200 gold since we've met, minimum, at this point. It's been like a week.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I mean, we've been making a good amount.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Nott, do you want mine? Just in case, if you want to join?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll take it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you guys are having this conversation there's a voice from the side that goes, "That was "quite an amazing display, if I say so myself." As you turn and look you see there's a gentleman there who's tall, a little over six foot, very--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, that's not what I was going for, I wanted to know what he looks like.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's a very strong looking human male with ruddy, tan skin and long, jet black hair that's braided in a single thick braid that goes past his waist in the back. He's dressed in partial scalemail across the chest and part of the shoulders, a dull iron color to it that's over his chest. You see a heavy waistband of dull gray leather that's like a thick, almost a foot thick piece around there and a rough-looking warhammer that's strapped to his side and he has his arms crossed and smiling widely at you with a very welcoming smile. "That was impressive. That guy "you just destroyed up there? He's kind of a douche."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I could tell.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes, you."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I mean, it depends on what kind of work, I guess.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, mercenary work, of course."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh, well yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right, well, first off, my name is Darrow."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Hello Darrow.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "What's your name? Yasha, you said?"

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: My name is Yasha.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right, pleasure to meet you. Well, I am the de facto leader of a mercenary band known as "the Stubborn Stock. We're out of Guar on the Menagerie Coast, but we've been hired for about a "seven month stint so far by the Empire and it's been paying pretty well. We've had some pretty "good scenarios here. The retainer's been nice and honestly, it's not bad to be paid to sit around in "case they need us."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: What kind of work? It's just going out and killing things?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, when they need us. To kill things, to hunt things down. There's a lot of business that "they can't bring the military to and the Crownsguard stay in the cities so they send us out "and about. That's only if they need us."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It's no contract? You can come and go as you please if you like?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, it's contract. You have to be there for their disposal. We're stationed up in Nogvurot "and have been for the length of this contract, but we were able to come down for this celebration and "it's been not too bad. It's good wage, sit around, occasionally hunt down some criminal Xhorhasian "terror that's come down from the mountains. It's a pretty decent living if I say so myself and you "look like a very capable soldier if I say, again."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah. Yeah, you can say so.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Sure. Would you be interested?"

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Maybe. I don't know. Do you have like a pamphlet or something?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter) "We have no pamphlet. My band of esteemed warriors are planning to be in the "Victory Pit later this afternoon."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (gasps) The Victory Pit!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We could very much use an additional soldier of your capability."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: We were actually thinking of going that way.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm afraid she's spoken for.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He turns and looks and seemingly for the first time notices the rest of your group. Goes like "Oh, I'm terribly sorry, I mean no disrespect-- hi-- but I do not understand that. I "do not wish to step on any toes here, it was merely a curiosity. What are you called?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The Mighty Nein.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: To travel incognito, but--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just kidding.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: The Mighty Nein.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "The Mighty Nein. Very good."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We're Yasha's booker. It's like her agency.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: They're all actually very, very strong and very tough. So--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah! I won this doll before!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He looks like-- "That's impressive. That's a good find. Good on you. You know who that's "supposed to be?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The king or something?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I was going to say a tiny asshole. One and the same, really."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait, I heard you say you were from Nogvurot, yes?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, we're stationed in Nogvurot, but we're from a ways further than that."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did you notice any of the kids that were missing up there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (sighs) "That has been an occasional problem, yes. We had been sent to investigate two "of those instances and in all of them it seemed to be that they were stolen-- I'm sorry, I do not "know how much I can discuss of these with you--"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh! We're really good at keeping secrets!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a general charisma check. Just to see if he trusts your face.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh boy. Do I trust your face?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, let's general charisma check-- oh, that would be a natural one there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah! All right!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We've looked into it. Do not worry. But we'll see how long the contract goes. I do not "know how much luck we'll have. It's kind of a dire situation."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is that what you're being paid for up there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "One of many things."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wow.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: You said you've been fighting on the frontlines of Xhorhas, or--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're basically bringing everyone they can on "hand to help keep the home fort defended."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: What are you fighting, if I may ask?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "What am I fighting? Right now?"

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Well, in Xhorhas. If you go out there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh, we haven't been to Xhorhas yet."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: You haven't been to Xhorhas.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "They've kept us in the Empire so far."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: They've kept you in the Empire.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yeah. They keep the army on the eastern side, but we're meant to find things that the army "cannot be bothered to do."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I understand.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You've fought in this Victory Pit before?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No, actually. We've only really been in the Empire for the first time this past half year and "I've heard things about it and, you know, figured we'd come and try it. They gave us a week off to "come down here to Zadash, and me and my friends are going to take our best attempt at this."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How many people are in your group?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh, well, within our person-- including myself, a grand total of six mighty warriors."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Whoa.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All six of you fight?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All six of us have our different techniques, yes."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What kind of techniques, just in case, you know, we have to fight you?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter) "I'm not going to tell you, and it's not that kind of tournament. Anyway, I do not mean "to be a problem. If ever you change your mind--"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is it the Gauntlet? Yeah, I know, what is it?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We have to go sign up for this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He pulls out a copper coin that's a little larger than a normal piece of copper and goes, "Just ask around." He tosses it to you and you take it. It looks like a small copper platter, coin-ish in its design, and on it is printed the name of his group, the Stubborn Stock.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They've got business cards? That is so cool.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We need to get coins.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We need coins, yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We need something.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: How do I-- what? Do I show it around or--?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, look for any place in a city where we might be or might not be and see if you've heard "of us in the vicinity. If they know where we are, they'll bring you to us. If they don't, they will not."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Where did you get those coins?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "One of our fellows makes them."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You have a blacksmith in the thing?!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's not made that well. He goes, "It's functional "more than it's beautiful."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I think it's great, you know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I appreciate that."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right, anyway. We have to go prepare for this tournament. If you're standing around, "please come cheer us on. That would be fantastic."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We need to go sign up for the tournament.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Absolutely, right now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "A pleasure to meet you, Mighty Nein!"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You too, Darrow!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He heads off, back towards the Victory Pit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Which we awkwardly go in the same direction. It's like when you say bye and then "Oh, are we--? Okay, we wait 30 seconds. One, two--"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: While we're waiting, can I just say, why did we not think about branding? We should have coins, cards, you should be writing a big nine on a wall wherever we go! Like everywhere, just tagging it, just everywhere!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Why a nine though?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Because we're the Mighty Nein.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I thought the nine meant that--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I know! They don't know that. When you say it out loud, it's much easier that our symbol is the number nine, don't you think?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think that if I saw lots of random nines around the city I don't think I'd know what that was connected to.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: If you

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: If you saw random mimes?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to start practicing making a cool logo for us in my sketchbook.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I am on an errand.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What errand are you on?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, well, I'll wait until they wind down, perhaps.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That could be a while.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It could be a while. Well, back at the Righteous Brand when I snuck out, would it be possible for me to find an alleyway or somewhere secluded so I can cast Disguise Self on myself? Around myself, not as myself.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, a short jaunt. Not too hard to find a darkened corner where you can do it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: My eyes go all fish-eyed. Everything else is the same.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Easy enough to do.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I would like to find one of those people who was dressed like they came from that library that I saw that day with Beauregard.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Make an investigation check as you begin to pore through the crowd doing this. You guys have noticed that Caleb's been gone for a little bit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's investigation, you said?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's a 24.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Wow, yeah. Within a very short time, asking a few questions and looking through part of the crowd, one of them points over to the edge of the Pentamarket on the northern side, and over in that direction there are two of the robe-wearing individuals. One of the monks that works within the archive itself and one looks to be wearing higher up robes. You're not sure what that means or what the ranking is within the Cobalt Soul.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I would like to approach them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, as you approach--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah. Excuse me! I'm sorry. May I trouble you for a moment? I know this is untoward in the middle of a festival.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The one that's in the nicer dress you can see is apparently an elven woman. You see these kind of long strands of blond, almost silver hair that goes in front of the ears and the rest of the hair falls past the shoulders. Beautiful, natural, no makeup. Even for elven standards, you can see a little bit of age. This is an older elf in comparison to a lot of the brighter faces that turns to you. "Of course, what can we help you with?"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, yeah. Again, I am very sorry. I am a traveling writer. I am writing a history of the great cities of the Empire and I have heard wonderful things about the library that is under your stead and I don't know-- I have viewed it from the outside, it is a beautiful structure, but I don't know what it entails to visit it. I was wondering, do you allow outsiders? I don't know if it costs a fee or if you need some sort of letter of recommendation, but I am very eager to learn about the library itself and the city and everything that I can learn about it so I can write more extensive-- it would just mean so much to me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a deception check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's all true, though.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (laughs) It is a 13.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A 13? Okay. "Well, of course. It is open to the public. You're required to come when there is "an available monk to escort you through the premises. Of course, you cannot take anything from "the archive itself, but you're welcome to read while in the presence of one of our various monks "and/or worshippers of the Knowing Mistress."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The entire library?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, the public portions of it, yes."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, of course.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You may take your own copy of notes, but once, of "course, it is only within the public space."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It is far simpler than I had imagined.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yeah. Well, I'm glad you asked."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Thank you so much. Forgive me, this is forward. What is your name?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm Jennah. Archivist Jennah."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It is a pleasure. This is a different subject almost entirely, but I was wondering, I mean to make a stop at all the great libraries of this city. I was wondering, is it a similar situation at the Hall of Erudition?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "They are a little different. They maintain their knowledge for those who are actually there "as part of the curriculum. You'll have to speak to the headmaster as well. They have, from what we "know, as we are not allowed either, quite a decent cache of arcane knowledge as well. There has been "some sharing, but they are particular."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What was the headmaster's name?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That would be Ornit, I believe." Let me double check here so I don't say it wrong. No, that is, no, "Oremid Hass."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oremid Hass.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oremid Haas is running the Halls of Erudition?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. Apropos of nothing, I have heard about this tower attack. That's terrible.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes, that was a bit disconcerting, definitely. Thankfully, it is a well-defended "tower. The Zauber Spire has stood for quite some time and has its capabilities defending itself as "we've seen."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm amazed it did not fall.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, you should ask them how they did that. You'll know as to why they're so secretive."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do they accept-- oh, no, they don't accept visitors there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, I don't know. We always go on specific business, so you can certainly inquire. I "haven't attempted to go from the standpoint of a possible student, but you could ask."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, I have taken up enough of your time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That is all right."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'd like to say thank you. Have a wonderful festival.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Of course. You as well. Happy Harvest Close."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I turn a corner and fucking book it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you return to the rest of the group, you guys are met by a strangely adorned Caleb with an interesting ensemble.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Got some new specs there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What do you mean?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: What did you just get up to?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: New robes, too.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I was sightseeing.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you need those and we never knew?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Where are we right now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys are on the outside of the Victory Pit. The crowds are starting to swarm into a central archway that's open.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Are they all around us or are we off to the side?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right now you are in part of the crowd as the people are rushing past.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, so I lean down to tie my shoe and let the cloak fall around me, and I get down between Yasha and Fjord, and when I come up everything is back to normal.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Your glasses fell off when you were bent over.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It gives me a headache, so I took them off.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Where were you at?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Exactly what I was saying. I was sightseeing, I was asking about their libraries of the city.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Lots of them around here?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Not so many.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Cobalt's a good color on you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You look good in blue.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (sniffs)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay, shall we go into the Victory Pit?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, let's sign up!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys gather your strength, your interest, your nerve. You go in with the rest of the crowd that is now beginning to gather towards the front end of the Victory Pit. As you step towards the central archway into the shaded interior of the main entryway, we're going to take a break! We'll be back here in a few minutes to pick up to this tournament and all that it entails.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Aw, man. What a festival!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What a festival!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Tonight as part of our Wyrmwood giveaway, we have a bocote tabletop dice tray from our friends at Wyrmwood. Very fancy leather interior, it's very pretty.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Aren't those the same kind--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Congrats. Diving back in, folks. You have muscled your way through the crowd, making your way into the shaded interior of the front portion, the receiving chamber of the Victory Pit, this two-leveled circular forum-like structure in the center of the Pentamarket. You push in the crowd, and people are starting to find each other and push away to find seats into some of the openings that lead off to the sides in the center. There is a pedestal with a barker or an organizer up there in a long dark gray and brown set of robes, a human male in his late 50s who's fighting his own age and losing. The comb-over thinning hair and a broom-like gray mustache that's poorly colored with dark wax. He's shouting out to the crowd, he says, "Please enter slowly, the event begins "shortly in the next few hours. Would you push aside-- (muttering) Yes, right! This way, please, "but go evenly!" He's pushing off two different directions. What are you guys doing?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Should we go in, then? Yes?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, I think we are.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is this where we go if we're going to fight?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm sorry? The fights will be soon."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How do we be one of the fights?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, we'd like to enroll in the competition.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh, you wish to enter?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh, entry may have already been closed."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no, we're real good! You definitely want us to be in this. We put on a real good show!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's about ten feet behind and he shoves through, closes behind him and slams. A few moments pass and people begin filtering through still, pushing past you and bumping you in the shoulders.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hey, what do you think that dude meant when he said it wasn't like a normal fight?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't know. I wonder how experienced these fighters are? Do you think it's stupid that we're signing up for it without knowing much?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes, very.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm also curious. Is it a bare-knuckles thing, or is no-holds-barred do whatever you want?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Maybe it's an obstacle course, you know, Ninja Warrior style.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Maybe it's like a cook-off.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'd be all right with that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: A cook-off, that is true. It could be.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Maybe we all sit around and talk about our feelings.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Fjord, you're really good at making chili.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The door opens again across the way as you guys are having this conversation, and the gentleman comes out again and goes, "Quickly, follow me."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes yes yes!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys make your way through the crowd and follow him into this back chamber. You enter with him. There's a slight hallway that leads into a low-lit lounge with comfortable furniture with cushions, there's some firelight, a few torches set up in the chamber. There is a window across the way that looks out into the open of the Victory Pit's main battle area. You can see servants wandering in similar brown silks and robes as the barker, but they're carrying trays of food. You see guests in expensive clothing that dot the distant walls and areas of the chamber sitting atop these cushioned couches and talking in low voices to each other, broken with the occasional laugh. The older gentleman ushers you over and waves in the distance as a figure begins to approach. This is another human man in probably his early 60s or so, who has graying hair that is slicked back and even further thinned than the gentleman who first met you on the way in, who has a very well groomed goatee that comes to an accentuated curve up underneath in the front. He's wearing a finely tailored dark blue festival suit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ooh, styling!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The barker says, "These are the ones who--" and the older guy goes, "Ah! It's far too late in "the day. We couldn't muster a-- Very well. I am Yadaka Brigman, Guildhead of the Filigree House "and organizer of this harvest tournament. Who are you, and have you the coin to enter?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, of course. We are the illustrious Mighty Nein. Servants of Zadash.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "The Mighty Nein. Where are you from, Mighty Nein?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All parts.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All over. Everywhere and nowhere.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: DM, could you say that crazy-ass name again?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yadaka Brigman. "You are from everywhere."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You will be announced as from everywhere."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's good. We are from lots of places, after all.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, makes us feel very worldly.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That's all right if that is what you require. All right! Well, we've warriors from "around the Marrow Valley come to compete today, many of which who'll have been on the front lines "of the eastern wastes. Are you still eager to lose your coin and risk your life?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I forget. Refresh my memory about what the fee is for entering this contest.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "20 gold pieces

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We'll have to leave one of our members--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's true.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Poor Stan.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Each victory is 200 gold to be dispersed amongst your group and the winners that remain at "the end split a 2,000 gold purse."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I believe that entry fee is along the lines of what I remember.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, that seems standard.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 20 gold will be fine.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are there rules or are we just allowed to use whatever we come into the tournament with?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Whatever you bring in there is at your disposal to utilize. With your group that would "make four who have signed up for the tournament today. You will brought down to the "waiting/holding area and each group will be brought into the Victory Pit to face off with the "chosen peril."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait, how did you get four?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Four

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Four

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Only three schmeasly other groups?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: What are we fighting? Are we fighting the other groups, or are we fighting something--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Of course not! You're fighting a number of creatures that have been acquired and kept for "this tournament. Beasts and things that have been either found wandering over the ranges of Xhorhas "or have terrorized the local countryside and have been brought to us by the Righteous Brand for this "sort of tournament."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are there frightening beasts? Big beasts? Magical beasts?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We know there are. I mean, that's what we're looking for, right?

lines.name: MATT

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Good question."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Our friends, the Stubborn Stock, said that this was the thing to do for people of our mettle.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're going to fight dangerous monsters.

lines.name: TRAVIS

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, do you wish to join?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Of course, yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Then present your coin. What is your name?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fjord. Here, 20 gold.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Beauregard.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Caleb. Beauregard, can you front me 16 gold?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (sighs)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: There's four more for you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: His name is Caleb and Beauregard, I want that clear and on the record. It's Caleb and Beauregard.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, and Beauregard is the family name.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Kylre.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Fancypants. 20 gold. There you are.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Very well."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Mollymauk.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yasha.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Money and glory is here before you."

lines.name: LAURA

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We have clerics on hand, and outside of extenuating circumstances, we've only had one true "fatality in the past 20 years of running this festival, so you should be all right."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Good to know.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: For the other groups.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: For the other groups, yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Enjoy some feasting while you're here." Him and the page walk maybe 20 feet from you to a corner where you can see there is a central couch there where a few figures are sitting, and they rush up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Kitty.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Mm-hmm.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Cat butt right in their face.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, just sprays them!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's graying and white on the sides, who sits up to meet with another important figure. Frumpkin has been pulled away.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Where did my cat go?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Your cat is being held by a servant.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The last I see of Frumpkin is where?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Being led back towards where you came, like taking the cat outside.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. I count to six and then I snap my fingers and pull him off of this plane.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Servant's probably confused. What're you guys doing?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I guess I'm going to do some jumping jacks to prepare for this.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I have a leather thong or a string wrapped a couple of times-- I'm going to ignore Laura Bailey-- wrapped around my thigh and I will grip it in my hand and say a few arcane words and cast Mage Armor and out from the leather strap around my leg, a light shimmer goes up over the entire body for a split second and is gone.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I would much prefer if it was actually a leather thong that you had to put on in order to get the Mage Armor.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You have not seen me with my clothes off yet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There are the groups that are talking and eating, there's the page currently engaging with the folks and the figure, there's a couple of servants passing around trays of food. What are the rest of you doing? You have retrieved your Frumpkin into your space.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How do we prepare for this, Fjord?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, I have no idea what we're going to face.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Fighting monsters!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We don't know that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's what the guy said! We're fighting monsters.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's another clap and you see two other figures get pulled from the other side to join the conversation by the couch.

lines.text: Should we go find out what's going on over there?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't think we can.

lines.name: SAM

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, go for it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can you give her some blessing-type of situation?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh yes (jibberish).

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will cast Silent Image and I'm going to go up to the corner, make the image of a three-foot by three-foot box around me.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to just (quick footsteps).

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's not noticeable at all.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, make your stealth check with advantage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Amazing.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Stealth?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You get advantage because of her blessing.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, wow. 19.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You saunter up at a relatively close distance. Make a perception check if you're trying to listen in.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can I see through the box? Oh, it's a listening perception.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, the box is an illusion.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Four.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter) Four.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fuck.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You miss that. You miss that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter) You miss that.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Secret warp zone to level eight, miss that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yadaka pipes in and goes, "Starosta, to announce anything like that would set panic and "change nothing. We are far from the fight. For now, let them have a day to rejoice. We'll "announce tomorrow." You miss the next thing, you miss the next thing. The last thing you hear is the Starosta say, "I'll send word to General Grinbreaker and begin preparing her legion to move "east. Tomorrow we'll notify the public, but page, return word to Rexxentrum that Zadash prepares to "join the front. Now, go." The page turns and leaves.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (quick footsteps) Still in box form, I am going to go back up to them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hey guys, it's me. I'm in a box!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, take it off.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, it's not a real box. I'll stick my hand through it. I heard

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What's going down?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: There's an attack on Ashguard something.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh! That's the garrison over by the--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, thank you! The King said we're going to declare war on Xhorhas or something like that, I don't remember. Then there's 1000 dead! The skies were black--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: On our side or their side?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know! Maybe ours? At the Garrison there was 1000 dead, so that's our side? Wait, no, we're not on sides! We don't like the Empire!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I mean, who cares, right?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Anyway, but they wanted to declare war and they're not going to until tomorrow.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Good thing we didn't join the army, huh?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What makes you think they're not going to start conscripting people tomorrow?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no! Maybe if you competed and they saw you were awesome, they're going to

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We should throw the fight.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Maybe we should win the fight, then maybe think about getting out of town?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I agree with Molly.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Caleb, is there anything about this letter?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do I notice anything?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Which letter?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's just the scroll from the--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a pamphlet.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't know, ignore what I just said.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Made it at Kinko's.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are there crownsguard in the little waiting area that we're in?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There are at the entrance where you came in and each side.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I make my way to one that's over by the entrance?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You back up towards where you guys came in, and there's a crownsguard there, arms crossed, looking up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Man, I cannot wait to see this year's Victory Pit competition! I hear the beasts are heartier than they were last year.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I certainly hope so. It's going to be a lot of fun to watch."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Which one is your favorite so far?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh, which one?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The beast they selected this year.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, I haven't seen them. They keep those under wraps. It's part of the surprise."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Really?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yeah!"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Man, I heard you guys were more informed than that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter) "Not us, that's above our pay grade."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Really? Sheesh. What do you got to do to get duty like that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, you probably have to go to the King's Hall and sign up for the Crownsguard. Kiss ass for "a few years and maybe then."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Where do the handlers of those beasts stay around here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I don't know. That's, once again, outside of my jurisdiction. They keep a lot of things "separate intentionally."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fair enough. You feel like dropping a coin on a team, remember The Mighty Nein.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Right. Appreciate that, friend."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I walk away.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That was good. That was very good.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It occurs to me that starting tomorrow, it would be more important than ever that we stick together.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All of us, or just you and Nott?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All of us.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Jester, high-five.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At this point, the barker who met you originally says, "Sorry to bother you, but they're "gathering the various teams down into the holding area. I'll have to escort you. Please come with me."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: As we walk off, I hold Caleb and walk behind a little bit. What did you hear at the Cobalt Soul?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You were trying to get into the Cobalt Soul, right?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, I talked to some people from there, yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You replicated robes from the Cobalt Soul, right? That's what you were going for.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It was a similar color, but not the same color.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, that was a nice little error on your part. You got real close. I can tell that you were trying to get the dyes. You know, the gradients.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Beauregard, is there something that you are after here?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Did you hear anything?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I want to enter that library, although tomorrow, anything goes. I don't know.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll get you into the library if you want.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How will you get me into the library?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I pull back my belt a little bit and show him the rest of the script written out on the back of my belt from the Cobalt Reserve.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Would I instantly recognize that as the same as the people I spoke to?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As far as the--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: On my trainer's belt on the back.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do you have a tramp stamp back there?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, it's on my belt. Fancy embroidery on the inside of my belt.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right. You look at it and there is similar design to some of the outfits and the--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I mean, there's probably enough to go on here. She's also dressed in blue. She's basically going--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. You pick up on it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, if we're not all dead in 48 hours, maybe we can talk about that again.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's fine. You know what, we'll talk about it tomorrow.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They are the ones stationed there to prevent folks from dying and the other combatants. In one corner, there are five soldiers of the Righteous Brand, one of which is Gunther, who are in the process of taking large handfuls of food and eating and getting themselves some energy for battle. As soon as you enter, they glance over and give a bit of a nod of notification. Gunther, looking straight to you, grabs an apple of some kind, and throws it at you. "Eat. You'll need it."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (whispers) He's got a crush on you, I can tell.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (whispers) Don't let him tell you what to do!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm in a box! (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We have a little box traveling with us.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I drop a little bit of spell components through the box.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: On the opposite side of the room to them, all leaning against the wall, you see five dwarves and two gnomes that are all wearing black and gold variations to armor, robes. They are avoiding all social engagements and staring, mad dogging everyone else in the chamber. As soon as you enter, all their eyes shift in your direction, and they watch you as you step into the chamber. In the center of them, you see a gray haired dwarven women, weathered skin and a surly grin as you approach, gleaming these yellow teeth from beneath, who gives a bit of a squinted stare at you as you pass by. You see two battleaxes resting at the side of her belt, hanging off of her armor.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is she her own team?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Then over by the doors, snacking and looking out the window into the pit before you, you see a group of six individuals in scuffed armor of green and brown with weathered armor and skin that shows experience and travel. Markings and accessories gives you a sense of inland Menagerie Coast heritage, and there you see Darrow who you had met earlier in the tournament, who's leaning out the window. He turns around as you enter and goes, "Ah, so you did indeed decide to join. Not too bad, "I'm excited to see how well you do."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Have you been in this tournament before?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm excited to give it my all, as you say."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What are you going to do about the flying creatures?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That's a good question. I imagine that's less of my worry, and more of theirs." He points out to the rest of the people in the stands, and goes, "I certainly hope they have ways to deal "with that, otherwise that's going to be a very unhappy day tomorrow for the people in the city."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Indeed.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: There will be a very unhappy day tomorrow.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Ixnay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Friends, this is the--"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The Mighty Nein.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They seem, of all the people in here, the most friendly. As soon as this happens, the crowd outside starts cheering loudly. The sounds of chaos begin to build.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Mortal Kombat!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This humanoid figure steps to the center. Now looking through the windows, you can see this is an open circular sand pit, where there are some wall-like structures in places and pillars beyond those to break up the interior. It has some small areas for cover and these pillars in the far corners of each side. This figure who walks in is a tall half-giant figure covered in tattoos and spiked armor. As he approaches, his hands in the air as the crowd's yelling and screaming.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I hope we don't have to fight him.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I want to be him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She raises a hand and then sits down. Make a perception check as she waves her hand and gray hair--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Natural one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nope.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Nine.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Six.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You glancing there, your eagle sight of an inquisitive monk of the Cobalt Soul, glance past and you can see where she's sitting, and there, about two people over sitting in the stand next to her is a familiar face. Pretty sure that's Dolan.

lines.name: SAM, MARISHA
lines.text: Our Dolan.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh. He was supposed to go. Right?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Caleb is popping his hood up over his head and face.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We also bring to this tournament the Headmaster of the Zauber Spire, who repelled the "Crick assault on our great place of arcane learning. Shaping the minds of our future mages, "Oremid Hass!" As the crowd cheers again, you see, back a row and to the left, a figure stand and raise a hand. Once again, everybody roll a perception check, please.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wow.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ugh, that was so bad. Not good. Five.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ten.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Six.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Nine.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Six.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nine. 16 was the highest?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Who was that?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That was Jester. Jester, you glance up and see, best you can a figure, a stocky, dark brown skinned man with very short curled black hair across the top of the head, very square jaw, in long red and gray robes. He raises a hand and smiles and everyone cheers. Sitting next to him you see a figure that you had seen before. You can make out an older human man with longer gray hair, bald on top. This was the mage you saw floating in the sky during the attack.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is he in white? Is that the color of robes he--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, white and gold.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Whoa.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "None of this would be possible if not for the love of you, and celebration from our esteemed "Starosta Wyatt Fedar!" There at the very front of that same area, you see the same halfling who was talking earlier to the page, step up on a small platform to give him a little more height and prestige amongst this point. The male halfling with the curly hair and the graying sides raises his hands and give a soft bow, and the crowd explodes and cheers.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You said this is the Starosta, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The rest begin to assault. Make an arcana check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 18. You don't recognize the creature, but there's something about this entity.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: There's just something about him.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, nine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No. All right, this fight goes on for another minute or so. You watch them trade blows back and forth. Nobody falls, and eventually the general carves his way from the stomach of the beast with a giant swipe of his blade. You watch as the blood begins to pour from it as he leaps out, coated in saliva and the creature's own crimson, spins around, and as the large toad beast pulls back, they all together, with one unified strike, surround and attack it. The beast lumbers forward and falls to the ground, unconscious. With a rousing cheer from the audience, the previous doors open. As the soldiers raise their weapons high and give a respectful bow, they begin to walk back towards the holding area, as they drag the unconscious body of this creature back to where it came.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do we all fight the same type of creature?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Probably not.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The emcee shouts again from the side, "With that, the banderhobb has fallen!"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Bander rob?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Next, a last minute addition to today's tournament. We bring forth, traveled from "everywhere--"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's us!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "The Mighty Nein!"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, shit, it's us!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The doors open again, and you guys are given a straight path into the center of this field.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, bring it out!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my god!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This was such a good day.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's okay. I bumped it on the way over.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Whoa. Did you print that? On a laser printer?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, this was from Mats by Mars, they do awesome stuff.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my god, that's so cool.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys can place yourselves where you'd like.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Where's the doors to the-- oh, they're over there. Got it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Any particular placement you'd like, as you guys have a moment to set yourselves up here.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Would I have been able to cast a spell as we are pushed forward into all this mess?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You would.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Blur.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Blur, all right. You have a Blur spell on right now.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Put me behind that wall, yep.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Where's the opening?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, where did the monster come out of?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys entered from this side over here, and you saw the monster enter from this space.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Matt, I take that back. I'm not going to cast Blur. Sorry, my apologies.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can you help me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What do you want to do?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I want to be there.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Can I do that on the other one, opposite her?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll back up into mine.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: As close to the center as is possible.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will be behind the pillar over there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Over here?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, this one over-- yes, thank you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That, I think, is the door where it opens.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It could be anywhere, to be fair.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, right. There's multiple doors.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The emcee disappears and vanishes into the back. You guys all take a quiet moment, looking around you in silence. As the audience gets quiet, still, you can see hundreds and hundreds of faces all staring, strangely formless when it's a cloud like this in all directions, little beams of light peeking through the clouds, hitting the sand and dirt on the ground before you. In that quiet, you hear (slamming). You glance around briefly and see not one, but two doors seem to have opened.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Only one of them has a creature that emerges. It seems like they're playing mind games with you so you don't know where it's coming--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Or the other one's invisible.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The door to this side suddenly swings open, and a beast begins to lumber out, chains detaching from manacles on two of its tethered, large tentacle-like arms. This grayish-brown mass, probably close to 15 feet in height, with a giant mouth filled with teeth and a large tongue that lolls off the side. Three tendrils reach off of it as these large, heavy feet pull it forward. Smell wafts around it of feces and rot. I need all of you to roll initiative, as this creature emerges right there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's a big eating-poop pile!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Liam knows what that is. Grody to the max!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, gag me with a spoon, Mrs. Henderson!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Gag me with a spoon!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hang on! Oh, that moved it! It was a 19 plus one. 24!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Whoa!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 24, all right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Beau, Molly! Anybody else? Okay, 20 to 15.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 18 for Caleb.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, 16 here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, Nott. 15 to ten? Ten to five?

lines.name: LAURA, TRAVIS, ASHLEY
lines.text: Six!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, dear.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh no! It's a sign.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (demonic voice) Present!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty, I believe that's everyone?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Top of the round, as this being (stomping) (sucking), its tongue slabbering around its open maw, Beau, you're up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (inhales) Okay! I can clear the distance, right? 40 feet?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Five, ten, 15, 20, 25. Yeah, easily.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh yeah, go closer to the creature. That's a good idea.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's what she does!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I fight with my fists, Sam!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't like it! It's scary!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Fists of fury!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Fists of fury, Mrs. Henderson!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Fists of furry, Mrs. Henderson!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Before I run off, I go: Does anyone know if this is a time trial, or something? Then I run off towards it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, are you driving straight towards it? Or are you coming from a specific angle?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, I mean, straight towards it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, there you go.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Then, instead of my staff, I'm drawing my two wooden swords that I won with Nott.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, no.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to beat face with my wooden swords, with my two attacks.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so are you--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: This is going to be great!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Here's my question: is this just flavor to your unarmed strikes, or are you actually trying to damage it with the wooden swords?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I was thinking more like flavor to my unarmed strikes, but I'm a monk, so?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so it looks like you're fighting with the swords, but you're really punching with them.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm punching.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's more for the show of it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. It's funsies.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What if they are like police batons?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're not that strong.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They're like balsa wood.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead. Two attacks.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: First one's a 14, second one's a seven plus six, so sorry, 20 for the first one and 13 for the second.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: First one hits, second one misses.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, ooh! That is 12 damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 12 points of damage as you hit it and you feel the actual wood of the sword crack a little bit, but your fist does hit the beast in the side, its giant blubbery, nasty body, almost slippery and sticky on impact, shifts from the blow. Is that your turn?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Then I'm going to spend a ki point and do one more.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ten.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Total ten? That misses. The third blow goes wide, no impact. That ends your turn. Molly, you're up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to use Vicious Mockery and just, you know: (demonic voice) You've got no arms, it's awful! It's a psychic attack.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I start laughing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's a--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It says wisdom, but is it charisma?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The DC's ten.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay, yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's a natural 20 on its saving throw.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That saves.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sorry.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's okay. I'm going to also use my bonus action to light my other sword.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so you have both blades now going?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I have both blades going now, so I'm knocking that down.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Which rite?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: With not the ice, the--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The Rite of the Dawn? Okay, got it. Both of your blades are now glowing.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to run, let's see, I've got 30 feet? I'm going to cross and run for cover behind that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That ends your turn, Molly. It is now the creature's turn.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, let's see what it weirdly does. It's going to poop on you!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Or breathe some awful breath of death.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's going to swallow people.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nope, that misses. You manage to duck it. However, it swings-- okay, that is a 17 to hit, what's your armor class?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just hits. As the tentacle misses to strike you, it does manage to grab you from behind and pull you in toward its mouth. As it opens and chomps down on you--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Aw, gross!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you're pulled into its poopy mouth.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ew! It's like Charlie!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is 15 points of piercing damage, and I need you to roll a constitution saving throw, as the horribly--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How much damage did he do?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 15 points of piercing damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 15 fucking points!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a constitution saving throw, please.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Don't. Fuck. Me Gil! Ooh, that was almost a natural 20! This always happens with Gil. Six?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Six, no. As the teeth sink into your body and you pull away, you feel this mild infection already begin to set inside you, and you are poisoned.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no, you're poisoned!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He gives you heartburn, you guys. It's real bad.
