lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's going to be an eight, that misses you. You duck and it hits the stone, causing this dust to spray off of it from the impact. That's going to end its turn. Caleb, you're up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I pull out a handful of iron powder, and I throw it into the air so it's a big cloud, and my two hands go (sweeping noise), and Yasha grows to twice her normal size.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: What?!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: For the purposes of that, we'll put Yasha on this big old dice there.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Does that mean I do twice the damage?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not twice.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes, it does.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Then I will use my movement to get over to the corner near Fjord. If I could get around it, I would, but I'm sure I don't have enough movement.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Six is about as close as you can get, there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, so you're at advantage because of your size and all of your attacks have an additional 1d4.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: (high-pitched) Ooh!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She's huge!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: She's 14 feet tall.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, you're six? 12 feet tall.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm like 5'11".

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 12-ish feet tall. Doubles it. Your weight is eight times its normal weight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have advantage on strength checks and saving throws, which is what your rage does, but your weapons do an additional 1d4 points of damage when you hit, which is good.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Excellent. I'm into that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I've had this dream.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Caleb, that ends your turn.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Question, quick retroactive one: Can I use my reaction attack when that thing attacked Jester to do my Sentinel thing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can, yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I do that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it. As it strikes and misses Jester, you get one swing, but it's with disadvantage on the attack because you're poisoned.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Nope.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Swing wide, unfortunately you're hazy in your view, and you feel the poison start to seep into your veins, the diseased bite of the creature starting to infect your torso. That ends Caleb's turn, Nott, you're up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will shoot my thing at it!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You other three are up after that, at the same time.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: 21 to hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits! Roll damage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is Yasha--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, they're adjacent, so you get sneak attack.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Whoa, that's good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, damn!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, (counting) 19.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 19 points of damage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, you know what? If I'm going to be honest, that thing is beyond 30 feet, so I would have moved in closer so I don't have to fire at disadvantage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so I'll put you about there to do that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Then do I have any movement left?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Five feet.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, well then I'll dash and I'll go back around towards me, behind this corner and hide. Just duck back there. That's it! Take a swig.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Take a swig. It's a free action. All right, Jester, Yasha, and Fjord, you guys are going at the same time, so you decide who is going to take their action first.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ladies first.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: We can go in that order.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Jester.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, well he's right there, so I'm going to use Sacred Flame on him. Oh, actually I'm really close and he's already been hurt. I'm going to Toll the Dead on him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What saving throw is that?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That is a wisdom saving throw!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Rolled a four. Three plus one.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I get to hit him! Seven points of damage!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Seven points of necrotic damage. As the bell (ringing) you watch as the creature shimmies in place.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I want to back away! Did he already use his reaction at all?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't think so. What do you want to do?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Just run away. What could happen?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Run away!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, fuck it, I'm going to stay right there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Jester stays. Yasha, what are you doing?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: If I move--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (deep voice) I'm sorry, you have to talk like this now.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: (deep voice) If I move (normal voice) right here, am I ten feet of the creature, but they're not ten feet of me, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't get reach with the Enlarge, so you still have to get one more to hit with the melee weapon.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay, I get one more, but I'm not ten feet away from Beau and Jester, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're ten feet away from Beau, currently.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Can I go one over to the right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There? You're ten feet away from Jester, yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Who do you choose?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I would like to rage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Rage kicks in.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm going to use my Magician's Judge sword and start swinging.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have any reckless attacks, or not?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Say again?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, that's fine.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh, no. 14.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 14 just hits, go ahead and roll damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You get advantage, remember.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not on attacks. If she does reckless, she gets advantage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, sorry.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And your 1d4 for being gigantic.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: (counting) 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 20 points of damage with the strike. As large Yasha (heavy footsteps)--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You added all your shit to that?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I added all my shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is going to be a thing. I have to make a large Yasha figure now. Swing the giant blade with two hands. As the blade carves down, it embeds itself four or five inches into the body of the creature. It pulls back instinctually, and as it does, it drags the blade through its body and blood sprays out. The blood itself is a thick brown color, and the smell gets even worse as it begins to spray its ichor around the air. Well done. Is that your turn?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yep, and I'm going to stay right there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Fjord, your turn.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I turn towards the beast, and I'll cast Eldritch Blast at it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it. You step out from behind cover.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That is a 23 to hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits. Go ahead and roll damage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That is a ten plus four, 14 points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nice!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I roll back behind cover?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can. Dart back onto the edge--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Even a couple more. Out of view, there we go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That ends your turn. Top of the round, Beau, you're up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's all right, 18.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Disadvantage on all attacks.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Disadvantage because I'm poisoned. 18.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 18 hits!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Matt, is that ring for what, concentration?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Concentration.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's not a thing. Nine damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nine points of damage as you strike it. This time, the wooden sword does snap. It breaks on impact. You still have the hilt.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I turn to the audience and I go: (yelling)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (distant yelling) There's a resounding cheer.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I go: Yasha, look! I do Patient Defense for my other ki point.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You go in your defensive stance. Good. That ends your turn. Molly, you're up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How many feet away am I from this thing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You are 40, 45 feet from it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to start dashing to that next-- yeah, that direction.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 30, that's your movement.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to do one more attempt at Vicious Mockery. (Infernal noises)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's a 14.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He still saves?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That your turn?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's what I got.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Now it's the creature's turn. With you right there in front of it, it's going to attempt to bite you, Yasha, with its giant mouth.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, not its poop mouth!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is 16. What's your armor class?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Aw, okay, hits you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Attack with my reaction!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Sentinel!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sentinel! Natural 20. Eight. 14.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 14 does hit. You take 15 points of piercing damage, and I need you to make a constitution saving throw.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay, I'm not going to use that one.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Does the Enlarge give her advantage on saving throws?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just strength.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Eight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Eight. Even in your enlarged state, the diseased gathering of bacteria and terrible elements--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: 15 points?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 15 points. The poison courses through your body, and Yasha, you are considered poisoned.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh, this sucks!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It takes seven points of damage from the unarmed strike.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It does. It's going to take its tentacles and swing one towards you, Jester.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh no, Jessie!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is 23 to hit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That hits me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's 11 points of bludgeoning damage plus eight points of piercing damage as it carves into you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to use Hellish Rebuke on him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, you still don't have any stupid arms, stupid!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You are also grappled, as the tentacle wraps around you and begins to squeeze and hold you in place. The teeth and the thorns that are coming out of the side of its tentacle jamming into your body. Is it a constitution save for Hellish Rebuke?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hellish Rebuke is a 2nd-level. I really wish it gave more information about what--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It will certainly be fixed, because D&D Beyond is a responsive company and we love them.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It doesn't say anywhere what Hellish Rebuke-- oh there it is! Dexterity save!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There we go. That is going to be a nine.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That means I get 3d10.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 3d10 damage to it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Rock that shit. Goodnight Irene, let's go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 12 points of damage. Nice. There's a burst of icy shards and blades that explode out of Jester into the tentacle and along the side of its body as it pulls back in place, swinging its other tentacle out behind it towards Beau.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How much damage did you say I just took, though? Because I was busy. 19 points of damage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: 11 plus eight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Even with a disadvantage, that is 18.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fuck! Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You suffer five points of bludgeoning damage, plus three points of piercing, so eight total, and you are also grappled.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All of the male players are 40 feet back, and all the women are right in there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Now you are poisoned and grappled. The two side tentacles, and there's the one large tentacle on top which, now that you have a closer look, has three vertical eyes in it that are glancing around and looking at the space. The two are wrapped around two of your allies as Yasha's dealing with the poison wracking through her veins. That's going to end its turn. Caleb, you're up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I am very aware of how many people are in this arena, especially high-powered ones, as I wrap one hand around my forearm and I cast Scorching Ray even though I feel nauseous, and off they go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it. Because it attacked Beau, you could use your reaction to attack it back with your Sentinel feat.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You have Sentinel also?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They both do. You have that. I'll let you do it now if you wanted to, if you want to take it.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Fuck yes. Yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: If you feel like attacking.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have disadvantage on the attack, unfortunately.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The first and the last one hit.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Natural 20. 13.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 13 just misses. You swing, and as you're about to hit with the blade, the poison pulses through your veins, and you go wide as the creature manages to be out of range. How much damage is that?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 15 points of fire damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Both rays slam into it and the flames burst up, and you hear (pained gurgling), trying to pull back from the impact, but it's currently by the wall, and it's holding onto your friends and holding its ground.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'll take a step five feet that way and as I do so I look over at Fjord and just-- and that's the end of my turn.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Big nope.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That ends Caleb's go. Jester.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, that's me!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes. You are currently grappled, and while you are grappled you are restrained until you break free.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I think it's my turn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, sorry, Nott's after Caleb, my bad. Thank you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ten!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ten goes wide. As it's reeling back from the blow of the flame jets from your buddy Caleb, unfortunately as you fire it moves just out of the way, and the bolt goes wide.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will reload and fire again. Oh god! Should we count that?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, I think so. What do you add to it?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know. Matt, do I count that or not?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's 18. It landed in my box, but it landed up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If it landed, then it's fine.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, 18 to hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 18 does hit, so go ahead and roll damage and sneak attack.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I get sneak attack?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's still adjacent to a friend of yours.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Great. 15.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nice, all right. It strikes on the inside of the mouth.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll take Fury of the Small, why not. 19.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 19 points of damage total, got it. (bolt impact, groaning) It looks like it's hurting, but it's also in control of the battlefield on that side there. That ends your turn. Jester.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Back behind a wall.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh god. Does it look like it's hurting at all?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It looks like it's hurt.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: While I'm in its grasp, can I touch the tentacle and cast Toll the Dead again?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you'd like to.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: If you think that would help.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I want to do that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. The saving throw-- that's cocked. No, that is a five plus one.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. Two.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hey, it all helps. It all goes to the same place. You are still restrained and held in place there. Anything else you want to do?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I probably should have tried to un-restrain myself.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're a great player.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, it's an action to break free.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's an action. Well, I already did it. I already Tolled the Dead, so too late.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: End of your turn?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I guess so.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yasha, you're up.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm going to attack again.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's no short rest between here and--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: There could be.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, there could be more groups, man.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He said about 20 minutes between rounds, and a short rest is an hour.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Do I have advantage on attack, or no?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: If you go reckless, you can.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yes, that's right, I haven't used reckless yet. Shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have not used reckless. That gives you advantage on your attacks.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: That gives me advantage, but that gives them advantage on attacks.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct. For now it's a straight roll, there's no disadvantage on that roll.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Sorry guys. Natural 20.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So nonchalant with that shit!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That'll do it. That doubles your weapon and the d4. You roll those together. It's whatever that is. It's your 2d6 for your weapon, d6 for your divine ability, and then your die, so then double that. Roll those, double that, and then add your plus seven.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I see.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ooh, no.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 17 times two is 34.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Plus seven.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Whoa, that's a lot.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How do you want to do this? (cheering)

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: No way, really?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you fucking murdered it!

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: (chanting) Yasha!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Remember, you're twice as big.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's pulling them back and their feet are dragging off the ground and causing grooves in the sand, and it's (growling).

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I want to take the blade, turn it down, and straight into the middle of it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Which you can do, because at your full height, you're about as tall as it is. In a downward angle, you thrust forward and jam it right into the center of its membrane above its mouth. As you push down, you watch your blade actually protrude out the roof of its mouth, through its mouth, through the tongue, and into the rest of its body, and as you push, it gives this horrible squealing, guttural, swine-like sound, and as you push, and push, and push, it falls onto its back, and you keep pushing, and you keep pushing, and the tentacles go limp and release both Jester and Beau. At that point, you pull the blade free, and it is not moving on the ground, bleeding out into the sand.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Whoa!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That was amazing.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That was fucking awesome.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to cast Thaumaturgy and start whispers throughout the crowd going: (chanting) Yasha, Yasha! Hopefully the crowd picks it up.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I run back into the hidden area immediately, and I don't stay out there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, good to know. Enlarge lasts for how long?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yasha, that should probably end right about (magic fizzles).

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Your size is reduced to a more diminutive stance. As you guys back into the inside, the poison, however, is still holding.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh no. Can we use some medicine?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes. I've got one kit left so I'm going to use my medicinal herbs on you, Beau, to get rid of the poison.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fuck yeah. Please.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Where are you at, Jester? Hit point-wise?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm very low, hit point-wise. I'm at 12 out of 31.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You want a health potion?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Huh?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You want a health potion?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, I can use my spells to heal us right now.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I think you should save--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The only thing I have that can get rid of poisoning is Lesser Restoration, which I can cast on Yasha right now. I can get rid of the poison on you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, but the poison will go away eventually, right? Won't it?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Not before the next fight, I don't think.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't know.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's probably--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: In your herbalism kit, you can make antitoxin if you're in a space--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, it's not an herbalism kit, it's medicinal herbs, which you specifically told me it removes poison on action.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes. It's a medicine check to apply it properly, but you can do that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Make that check!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What's your medicine check?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm proficient-- oh, that's good.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: A lot.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, it's a 23.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. As you guys back into the corner, you manage to go ahead and apply the medicinal herbs, which are used now, but the poison does manage to fade from your body, Beau. You are no longer poisoned. You're using Lesser Restoration on Yasha, you said? Up to you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, I'll do it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, the poison is removed, which is probably a good thing because it lasts until cured.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh wow!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Technically, it's a disease that causes poison, but because the nature of the herbs that you've utilized in this space, it fits in a similar realm because it's a bacterial infection that kicks in. I'll say because you got to it quickly enough and you rolled so high, you were able to do that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Because you got stabbed with poop-teeth.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Kind of, yeah.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Jester, what are you at, right now?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm at 12 hit points.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You need to heal!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I give her a potion of healing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yasha, you need healing too!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: No it's fine!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are you sure?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yes, I'm sure.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I won't deny it, but I also won't request it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, fucking take it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's what? How many d4? 2d4?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 2d4 plus two for a healing potion. As you guys are in the process of doing this, you hear the voice shouting out-- not even realizing the other group that walks outside. "The Mountain "Makers from Grimgolir!" The dwarf and gnome troupe makes their way out into the field. As the crowd cheers, the emcee vanishes, and you see an opposing side open once again. Immediately bursting through, you see a large, nine-foot troll with elongated arms and legs start rushing into the fray, screaming this high-pitched yelp. As it runs, you can see its skin, as opposed to the deep forest green that you've read about or seen in trolls in your experiences, this looks like a dull teal-blue color. You watch as the dwarves, all of a sudden, rush in. The gnomes begin casting spells, and this assault goes back and forth. You see with each strike this cold mist off the claws of the troll with each blow. You watch as the gnomes begin to apply fire upon fire, and you watch as the entity burns, their intelligent knowledge of the creature causing it to prevent it from regenerating. Fairly rapidly, they make short work of it. They were prepared, and it was not as intense a battle as you were expecting. With that--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Did it look like they prepared anything with fire before the creature came out?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: To your memory, you didn't know that. You didn't notice anything. With the final of the battle, the cheers go wild, the crowd goes crazy, and eventually, The Mountain Makers make their way back into the field. Anything else you guys needed to prepare at this time?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: They had real good teamwork. Maybe we should come up with special moves.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Like what?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Like heal.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Like don't run up so close, or at least wait a little bit first to gauge the beast.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Don't run into the -- You're going to die!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Out from the Menagerie Coast! The Stubborn Stock!"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, that's not us.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Behind you, as the doors open, they move past you. Darrow goes, "Hey, wish us luck, friends," and enters into the sunlight.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Good luck!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The doors close. Looking out past the way, another door opens off to the side, and you watch as a 15-foot-long crocodile becomes barreling into the center, its jaws opening and snapping as it comes rushing in. It climbs over the wall that the guys are getting behind to defend and immediately snaps down on one of the soldiers, who gets hit in the side and screams out in pain. They all begin to rush in and assault, jumping off the wall and getting onto its back. You watch as Darrow climbs up onto it, taking a shortsword that one of his friends had dropped, and jams it into the top of the head. As he pulls out his battleaxe, he begins to hack away. He seems to be laughing. Another friend pries the mouth off of the one soldier that had been stamped on. He limps away as it spins around, its tail slapping one of its friends, sending him flying back ten feet as his weapon goes skidding into the sky. It hits the dirt off the way. He runs to try and retrieve it. The battle goes back and forth for a while. One of their friends goes down and one of his allies grabs and pulls him away from the battle zone as he begins to try and wake him up. At this point, you watch as Darrow makes a couple of motions to his friends, and they all cycle in and assault at one time, cutting at the throat of the large crocodile as Darrow takes his axe and carves out one of its eyes. As it pulls back, screaming in pain, they both come underneath and cut through the throat at the same time, causing it to bleed out. With that, the crocodile collapses, not moving, into the field.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Did you see that? He had a sign, and then things happened.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They slap awake their ally, and they begin to drag themselves back into the chamber as the crowd's cheering. They're a little wounded and a little winded, but as they come in, "Heh! That "wasn't too bad! You're on deck, I suppose!" They bring their friend over to the side, and one--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: They used cover really well. We should try and hide ourselves better.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can make a box!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, don't do that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can actually make a 15 foot large box! We could all fit in it!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to take a healing potion.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nott had a great idea actually though. We should keep our distance.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Keep our distance. We don't know what door they're coming out.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We don't.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Did we see which door the last two monsters came out of?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The one that came out here. The crocodile came out here.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That was the last one?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That was the last one.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: What about the teal thing? What was the-- Who did The Mountain Makers fight?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, the ice troll! Sorry. The ice troll came from this side there. They are changing--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: They're changing.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You people that need to be up close, just wait until it gets to you. Make him chase you for a bit. Use the cover. Let's put some damage on it before--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I could do that. I could be a distraction--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They fall. The final minotaur roars up into the air and the whole crowd goes, "Oh!" You watch as two groups come out with chains and manacles and manage to grapple and throw them down. The lasting minotaur passes out in the chains and they drag him back off the field. The two clerics rush out into the field and prevent death to those who are in the process of slipping. With that, The Last Line is pulled back, the first fallen out here in the field.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That was intense. Would we be able to have fought those two minotaurs?

lines.name: MARISHA, TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't know.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No! Of course not!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "The first fallen in the tournament!"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Focus on one target at a time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Let us greet back to the field, The Mighty Nein!" The doors open once more.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: She's Cure Woundsing me!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. Where do you guys wish to be placed?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is it possible to climb up on one of the walls?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you'd like to try.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to try and climb up on top of the wall.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an athletics check real fast.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Am I able to take a potion of healing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's really good. This one, sure. Why not.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This one here?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll back up into that far corner.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This one here?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's a 22.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you're fine.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll move here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nott?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Dead center. I'm going to cast Mage Hand.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Yasha?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm going to stand by Caleb, actually.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You're with Caleb there?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Beau, ten points.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes! I love you, Jester!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. As you guys all take your place, two gates immediately open again. You hear two sources of this loud, deep (howling). Leaping through both sides, you see two massive, white furred wolves come leaping through into a full sprint.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I Invoke Duplicity in the middle of the-- next to Nott.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: From this side and this side here. You Invoke Duplicity?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, next to Nott.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (screaming)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Natural 20!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Natural one!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Aw, Caleb. My dice fell.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hundred dollars.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sorry, mic. All righty, for this new round, 25 to 20?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh shit. We have Beau--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Jester, and Molly.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You got it. 20 to 15?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh wait, I rolled high!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right then, it'd be Yasha. 15 to ten?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh no. No, that isn't me either.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ten to five?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Nine.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Six.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Six again, Fjord?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Two for Caleb.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Caleb at the bottom.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I rolled a natural one, so--.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Top of the round, as the wolves begin to emerge, Beau, you're up first.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. I'm going to run (counting) 40, I guess?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Look at the blood on there already.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm-- Yeah, that's cool-- I'm going to look at this one and I'm going to go, hey (whistles), go fetch! I'm going to throw my other wooden sword at that one, and then I'm going to do Patient Defense.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Right in the middle of them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an animal handling check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Animal handling.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just because I want to see what will happen.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to use this lucky die that this Critter gave me! Okay! 20!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You throw it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Come on boy!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's your action.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait, what do you mean that's my action?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, to get its attention and try and throw it?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can't take a ki point to do Patient Defense?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Patient Defense is a bonus, you're fine.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, so Patient Defense.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, that ends Beau's turn. Jester, you're up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to cast Sacred Flame at the one behind me!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's a dex save.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's a failure. That is an eight.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and roll damage on that one.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Five points of damage to him!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Five points of damage, nice. All righty.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Or her.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As the divine flame burns up around it, it's still running.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to make my Invoked Duplicity Jester run right in the middle of the two walls, past Fjord.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right there?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, and she's going to start going (gibberish).

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Look at me, look at me!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, that ends your turn. Molly, you're up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to take a run towards the fake Jester.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. 25. 30

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, it's where I can get there. I'm going to try and see if I can make Vicious Mockery work on this thing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have line of sight.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I do have line of sight?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's a eight, so that hits.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (sinister voice) Bad doggy! (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Butt turkey?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yep, butt turkey, you heard me. That's one point of psychic damage and it has disadvantage next attack.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's going to rush up and partially pass through the Jester illusion, look back and see all that crowd in front, in its area. It pulls back and its shoulders curl up and the fur expands and (deep roar). You watch as a burst of freezing winter air blows out of its open mouth.

lines.name: LAURA, SAM
lines.text: (groaning)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I need you all to make a dexterity saving throw.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Even though I am high up?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, it's a cone out in that direction.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Round two.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's a success.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Four.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nope. Yasha?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Natural one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay! (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, fuck me. Oh god.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 16 points of cold damage to Yasha and Caleb and eight points to you, Jester.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Already? Eight points to me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Halved because I'm resistant to cold damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Exactly, so four. The other one is going to (galloping noises) turn around--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What?!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's not going for a wooden sword.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I rolled a natural 20!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You can certainly try.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It saw it for a moment. It's going to move, rush up here.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That was a ki point! A very valuable ki point!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It was running out and you whistled and it went (grunt) and kept running.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fuck!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's going to go ahead and blast another cold air bit in that direction that will go for both Molly and Fjord. I need you both to roll dexterity saving throws, please.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Roll high.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Eight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You barely succeed!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ooh!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Molly does not. That is 26 points of cold damage to you, Molly. I rolled really well on that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, jeez!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's 13 to you, Fjord.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 26 points?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I am not resistant to cold.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You are not, unfortunately, no.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 13, yeah okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Ow!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait! You're out?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, I'm fine. I'm not fine but ow!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, and as it finishes blowing, it growls in place. That's going to end its turn.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Damn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, so that will bring us to the next round. That's Yasha, you're up.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (shouting) Pick one and focus fire on that one!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay, so reckless. Let me see something here. Sorry. Where's the hex? Divine Fury? Can I do that as well?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. Go for it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are you raging?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I don't have any more.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You raged too much in the games of chance.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Wait, do I have advantage, or that's it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have advantage with your attacks, if you're reckless.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: (cheering)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That will hit!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Divine Fury is an extra--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Ah! Should have had disadvantage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Disadvantage doesn't affect it. It's a cone.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's a cone? Yeah, okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sorry.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Ugh. (counting) Eight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: See, technically it would be-- It was a natural 20? You only roll three of those dice.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Well, is Divine Fury an extra d6.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, that's how it is.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It's three, I'm sorry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's okay.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay. (counting) Seven, ten, 27.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As it carves past, you see where the white fur has now become red on its left side. It (whimpers) pulls back from the pain. Part of its flesh is flapping from the wound you left as you draw the blade back. That was a pretty hefty hit. That ends Yasha's turn. Nott, you're up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, I'm going to aim for that flap of skin.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Fjord, you're up next.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Fire. 25 to hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That definitely hits.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That is 16 points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 16 points of damage. Beautiful!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (reloading) Same place.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: 16 to hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits! Roll damage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Six points.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Six to that guy. As both bolts hit the open wound that Yasha left behind, it's now starting to growl and look like it's in pain and is getting cornered-animal angry.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to run this way, as far as my little-- well, so I can still see everybody and the action.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, that ends Nott's turn. Fjord, you're up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm going to cast Armor of Agathys on myself, and I'm going to use my bonus action to cast Hex on the wolf that's nearest to Yasha and give it disadvantage on dexterity checks. I'm going to use my movement to run towards that wolf.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This wolf here?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Mm-hmm.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can get there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: In between Molly and Yasha.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I know I do. That is going to be a nine. That does not hit, it's a three plus six. Its jaws snap behind you and you hear the impact, but it's too far below you. That ends Fjord's go. Caleb, you're up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I pull out a cat's paw and say: (stuttering) Bad dog. Maximilian's Grasping Cat's Claw comes out by that one there. It has to make a strength saving throw.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This one here?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ja

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Strength saving throw. That is going to be a 12. What's your DC?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 15, no. He is held in place. As the hand creeps up and grabs it, it (yelps) and it's held in place now, up off the ground, its paws held as this giant caw paw is holding the doggy.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Und

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What does restraining it do?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Everyone gets advantage on it and it's at disadvantage to hit us.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's great!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That ends Caleb's turn. At the top, Beau, you're up. Jester, you're up next.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, I'm going to look around with my defensive stance and be like "Aw, fucking really?" and then go: Parkour! Stab!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, attack the one that's by all of us!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, this guy's got advantage!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Stay out of the cone, get on the backside.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's fine! Oh, wait, that guy's cone?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're already there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, it's on.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're there. You have advantage on your strikes, though.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Advantage. I'll take that natural 19, and then for my second one-- advantage on all of them?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, because it's restrained.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll take that 13?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 13 just hits.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, so the first one: not great, six damage? Second one: better, eight damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Eight damage, all righty. As you leap over, slamming your fist down-- or, your staff down-- on the nostril of the restrained wolf, and then as you land, hit it with the back of your elbow. It takes the impact, but it can't move anywhere; it's held in place by this magical--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do I still have a little bit of movement?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I move behind it a little bit?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It would be-- Yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, also, sorry. It takes bludgeoning damage from the attack that I gave it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll damage for that, please. You're trying to move around it? You have about 15 more feet of movement, I'll say.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I come right here to it? You know what-- nah, it's fine. Whatever works, it's all good. I'm into it all.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Six.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Jester, you're up. Molly, you're on deck.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Having seen Beau do that just then and it looked really cool, I'm going to jump off the wall with my handaxe in my hand and try to come down onto the back of the one right there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you're going to run across the wall?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hardcore parkour!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That is a 17 to hit! Nine points of damage!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nine points of slashing damage against this, nice.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fighting's more epic when you're flying through the air!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you carve down with the axe and it cuts through, it yelps again. You guys are cutting it up pretty bad. It's hurting. It's not on death's door or anything, but it's hurting. Its fur is starting to get matted with its own blood with each blow. That ends Jester's turn-- or, anything else you want to do with your turn?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I back up? Is it going to get an attack of opportunity?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Only one way to find out.

lines.name: TRAVIS, TALIESIN
lines.text: That's a yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to move to his tail. To the pillar, yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, you're right up against the pillar, we'll say. That ends your turn, Jester. Molly, you're up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to take a slashing attack at the guy right in front of me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's-- oh, goddamn it-- that's 12 to hit?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 12 does not hit, unfortunately. It ducks out of the way.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (mix of cheers and groans)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're trying to swing at it, but unfortunately, for some reason, the howl of its presence and it moving so quickly in front of you throws you off and your blades are not going well.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to try and circle around a little bit to space everybody out a bit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That ends your turn, Molly. It's now the wolf's turn. Let's see if they get their breath back. Nope and nope, neither of them do!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Huge!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They are both going to make a single bite attack. One of them is going to be, let's see, against you, Yasha. You did the most amount of damage to it, so it's going to make a bite attack against you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is going to be-- and it has advantage, since you used your reckless. That's going to be--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It still has disadvantage from the-- for its attack, though.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right, so it would have been the first strike. That would be a total of 14. What's your armor class?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Aw, just hits! That would be 12 points of piercing damage as it bites down on you with its giant jaws. I need you to make a strength saving throw, which you do not have advantage, currently, because you're not raging.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're still strong.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Super buff, and not just in the game.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Success, it does not knock you prone. It bites and tries to throw you onto the ground, but you push off of its jaws and use the back of the wall to steel yourself and kick its mouth off of you and still stand there, resolute, with your blade in hand. The other one is going to attempt to break free. It does not like being held in place by there. What does it have to roll to break free?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 15? What kind of check?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, strength.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Strength? 13 plus four, that's 17, yeah. It manages to break free of the hand.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's its action, correct, to break free?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's its action, correct. It will move over here to flank up right there. Beau, you do get an attack of opportunity as it moves out of the space, and if you hit it, it does prevent it from moving.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (singing) It does! 14!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It gets dragged back. It does not get into melee with the rest of your friends as you grab that tail and then pull it back.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, that's eight damage. It's like a Looney Tunes cartoon. My heels are dug in.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you're pulling the tail, it's screaming.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Show me your belly!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (sympathetic groans)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's going to end their turn. Yasha, you're up.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Wait, I'm within ten-- oh, yeah, I'm right next to Fjord, huh?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: All right, I'm going to take another attack.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Reckless, all the stuffs.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How you want to do this!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Natural one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Good thing you went reckless.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Natural 20! (cheering)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Jesus! I think you found your snitch!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay. Nine, 18 (counting) 25 points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 25 points.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Probably still not enough.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, how do you want to do this? (cheering)

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I want to grab over his head, rip--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Technically, it's not plus two with rage, because it's not plus seven, right? Because you weren't raging.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Say that again?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's 23.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It's 23, okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Because you're not raging, remember. There is two damage from that you don't have on the plus seven, so it's plus five.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Still enough to finish it, but I wanted to let you know.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Wait, what's the plus five-- break it down again?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's plus three for strength, plus two for your Divine Fury, and then plus two for your rage damage-- that makes it plus seven, but you're not raging.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay, right, I see what you're saying.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (relieved groaning)

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay, sorry. I need to write all these down in my notes later so we don't have to keep going through this. I'm going to go over the top of his head and force his jaw open and then take my blade and put it through its mouth, straight through its mouth. Skewer it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As the blade carves through, you hear it yelp, and its growl turns into this low, guttural (fading growl), and goes limp in your grip as you push it and draw the blade from its body. It slumps onto the ground, right at the base of Jester. Molly, you both take a step back as the body slumps to the ground, no longer moving. Hex is off.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I pet him and say: Good doggy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's the end of Yasha's turn. Nott, you're up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I do what I always do, I fire my crossbow at the beast, for a 14 to hit?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right-- ooh, and it's sneak--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It is definitely sneak attack.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, 12 points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 12 points of damage to it, all right.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How's everyone-- is everyone alive right now?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Everyone's up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Barely. Yasha could use some healing.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yasha's right next to me-- I mean Beau.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ah, couldn't see her behind the wall.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will do the same thing. I will reload and fire again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's a miss. Ten points.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ten to attack, you mean?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ten to attack.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (arrow firing sound) It goes too wide. It hits the stone behind, almost hitting Beau. You're like (scattering sound) as it sparks off the stone. No impact.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll duck behind the wall and hide like a weakling.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Fjord, you're up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: With my bonus action, can I transfer my Hex onto this wolf, and can I start running around to get to its right hindquarter? Staying in melee, but getting on its rear.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, you're going in melee with it?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Mm-hmm.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so you move there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I keep coming this way a little bit more? Yeah, right there. I reach back, and as I start to swing my hand up, I'll summon the Wastehunter falchion and slice up through it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As the blade appears in the hand, you see a blast of greenish energy as the blade apparates out of his grip. As he swings upward, it sends an arc of seawater splashing into the air. Go ahead and roll for an attack.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Both me and my invoked Jester go: Ooh.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's 26 to hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That definitely hits.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is this the same sword we've always seen? I don't remember the word-- Liam doesn't remember the word Wastehunter.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Same sword, looks a little different.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 13 points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 13 points of damage to it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: One d6 necrotic for another four, so 17 total.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you arc upward, it cuts upward, the splash of seawater mixed with the arc of blood from the wound. The way you carved up hits the back of its thigh, and one leg collapses for a second and it looks over at you with these angry, piercing blue eyes. It's looking pretty hurt. It's limping to that side, now. You guys see that the falchion has a slight curve to it and has a hooked end to the back of its design. That finishes your turn, Fjord. Caleb, you're up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ja

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits, go and roll for damage.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Total of nine fire damage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nein

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Total of nine fire damage to it. As it's turning back and forth and growling, and Beau's harrying it from the side, the two rays of fire slam into its side and it turns back around. You can see the dark burn marks on its white fur where the impacts have started to burn, and you can see some of the skin underneath where the hair has been burned away is black and cracked. It's hurt pretty bad.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Perfect. Ending Caleb's turn, Beau, you're up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, I'm going to take my staff-- after I threw my sword, I'm going to crack it in the nuts and crack it over the top.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: First attack and second-- first attack is a natural one!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It was so slow--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It really was. Second attack is a 17.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 17 does hit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's in there. That is a four, so eight damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Eight points of damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe the dice gods really want the charity to do well.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I think that's it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you slam it with the second hit up in its groin area, it's impacted. It's hanging on. It's hurting, but it's pretty beat up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Spay and neuter your pets! I'm going to do Flurry of Blows and I'm going to do one more.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, get it. Finish him.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh my god! Another natural one!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's good.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fuck, it really is.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Terrible.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's two natural ones in my turn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yasha and Beau have been hitting two sides of coin tonight. All right--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Bob Barker is not here tonight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I know, how many ki points do you have left?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's it. Done.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's the last one. All right.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, no.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Doneskis.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, that ends Beau's turn, Jester you're up, and Molly you're after that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to Toll the Dead.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: My invoked Jester is going to run around and stand next to Fjord.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Runs around-- It rolled a 14, what's your DC?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Resists it, unfortunately.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, no. No toll.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sorry.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No toll or anything.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Anything else on your turn?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think that's basically all I can do, though.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Molly you're up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to breathe deep and take a run at this damn thing.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Come on.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Straight into it and I'm going to come swinging out at it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Tell us how you taxidermy it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's a hit, that's a 23 to hit?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That'll hit.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This thing doesn't take extra damage from this does it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, it does not.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, that's fine. Seven points of damage for the first hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Seven points, all righty.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is that right? No, wait, yeah that's right. Then, 23 to hit-- 21 to hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep, roll damage.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's seven points of damage again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How do you want to do this? (cheering)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I want to go in and I want to see if I can carve through the mouth as deep in-- I'm going to try and get right in there-- I'm going to do a dental jawbreaker.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you go rushing towards it, it opens its jaws to strike. You slide down and with one scimitar you jam up into its lower jaw, which causes its upper jaw to be stuck and as you pull it out its jaw falls open. As it does, your other blade, you backswing dropping-- not dropping, but holding on with both hands on the other side, swing through and as it carves in, you actually get about one to two feet inward as the jaw lolls open. The tongue slips out as you cut it from the inside of the mouth. Its eyes go dull as the creature's body collapses to the ground, no longer moving.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Fucking yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With that point, the whole crowd goes cheering--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yasha, Yasha.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Yasha, Yasha.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The gates where you came open, and you all go and return.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The minute that it ends I'm going to start casting Prayer of Healing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, as you guys step into the back chamber, you cast Prayer of Healing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. Who all is injured right now?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm pretty bad.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: One, two, three, four.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm pretty shit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm not too bad.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're not and you're not at all?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I've been drinking and hiding.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, so I'm going to cast it on the five of us.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I could get knocked out by a crownsguard right now.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Could you give it to one more? Do you have to spare?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay, I'll take some.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh yeah, that's what I'm asking. I can do six people.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay, great.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's decent. 14 points to everyone.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh that's great. That's huge. Wow. Healer.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At which point you see the two groups come out again with the chains and the come up to the outskirts of the owlbears which then pass out, and they put the manacles on and then pull them away.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: They pass out when the manacles go on?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They pull them off, and drag them, the gates open wipe, the clerics rush out and grab and drag in the bodies. The gnome is gone but one of the clerics reaches over and touches him, and for a moment later (gasps) breath comes back and you watch the wound close up somewhat. Brought from death. As they pull the group in--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I need to learn that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The shout comes for the next group. "The Stubborn Stock returns!" and Darrow and his team rush out, giving a pat on the shoulder to Yasha on the rush out. They go out to the middle field, the gates close, and there, two of the gates open on the sides and you see these dark shapes kind of-- (materialization noise)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, no.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Almost skittering but shifting, their position seems hard to map. At which point you see Darrow glance on the side and he goes, "Oh no, I know what this is!" You watch as these large panther-like creatures with large tendrils off their back whipping begin rushing inward.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (shouting) Displacer Beasts!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're hurt, their bruised, and Darrow's looking rough, but with that the Stubborn Stock raise their hands "The Stubborn Stock, continues!" and the crowd cheers.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I was hoping they would lose.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Two rounds completed, and only two teams remain for the third and final round, will they all fall? Will they all survive? We shall see as next, we call forth The Mighty Nein!" Any preparation you guys have in this moment as the doors begin to open?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Everyone--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm tapped.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm so tapped.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait! What if we just stood next to all the doors and held our action until something came out of them?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Then they would be alone out there for like two rounds.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What are you talking about?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well we attack and then run to the middle.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Plus somebody's going to be super danger close right off the bat.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, but we get a hit in on them the second they came out.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm kind of into it. I--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That seems like a terrible plan.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Why is that a terrible idea?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We've got some super squishy people in here that won't make it past--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're all one hit away from--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We might get a surprise attack on them.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We would get a surprise round on them!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't think we would get--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: There's only like four doors right?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, so pick four people I'll take one of them.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Pick the less squishy?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All right, if that's what you guys want to do.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Let's do it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think it's a terrible plan.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It might be a terrible plan.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's do it!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, no, no, I'm kind of into it.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: We could also try to get inside and get the chains because they are scared of those and--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Just to have him with me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yasha--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At this point the crowd's cheering, "Mighty Nein! Mighty Nein! Mighty Nein!"

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The doors are open, what are you guys doing?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll go take one of the doors.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm taking a door.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm taking a fucking door.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: For the record, I do not like this plan.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I love it!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I don't like it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Who's going where?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: If we stay flanking somebody, anyone who runs away from us--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh that's true, that's true.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Maybe we can go, you want to take a door?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How long does your illusion last?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Invoke Duplicity I think lasts for-- I want to say an hour but I don't know if it does.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I will stay with Fjord.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll take a door.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Caleb's going to stay with Fjord.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You should get some distance.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yasha and I will take a door.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Just pick me a door.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Pick you a door? No, you get to pick, Nott.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This one's fine, it don't matter.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right next to there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Any ideas?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is such a bad idea.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The idea is that whatever doors they come out of will get one surprise round and then whoever's by those doors better be able to take some damage--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Defend themselves, yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You don't want to be near me. You should be in the middle, able to move.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What are you doing, Yasha?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm over there flanking with Beau.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to go, with me and you Molly on the other door.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is such a bad idea.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is going to be like two rounds to get to whoever--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How long does Invoke Duplicity last?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You're going to be alone for two full rounds with whatever this thing is.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm fast as fuck.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, what if you're there-- what if it comes out of that door?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right, this is how much time we have to plan in the moment as this is happening.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is a terrible plan.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Guys--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait what are all the doors by-the-by?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, there are four doors right?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: There are four doors?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, there's one two--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: For one minute, so your Invoke Duplicity's gone.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, I'm going to hop up--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't know if the map is accurate to how many doors there are--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, Matt, can you please do us a favor and point out the doors?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right. One, two, the map is accurate to them, four--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fuck that, no, no, no we've got to get in the middle. This is a terrible plan.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: There are five doors.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: There's too many doors.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, no.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Five doors. You guys exit from this one here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to do the same thing and hop up on a wall like last time.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, we come in from one of the doors, so there's only four.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you came in from this one.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, that's a good point.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, there's only four doors.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: There's those four others besides the one we came in?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Four others beside you guys yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This is about how well we do--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Guys, quickly. Coming in, what are you doing?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Four doors, four doors, I'm going to-- I'm going to stay by Yasha.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's your plan?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Anything else I don't care.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to hold my attack for the door that--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to go to the opposite point from Caleb.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, no, we got to come in the center, we got to take advantage of the sentinels.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's the point of the feat. We're spread way too fucking thin.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, this is so bad.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Go back in the middle like we thought we were going to do.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're going to drop so fast.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The crowd cheering dies down, what are you guys doing?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, okay, okay. How about we take Sam's similar approach, but we guard these four incidences.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What are you doing?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay Yasha and I are going to move here, and guard these two.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to go against the wall, against the back of that wall there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I stay where I am and I'm casting Mage Hand.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It is hard to walk on two legs, maybe four is better.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Holding my attack!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I want to be on the other one.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Nott, you're staying there?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm staying and I'm holding my attack until something runs out of my door.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nott, you're staying there?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm ready to shoot anything that comes out of this door.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You're going to be at disadvantage because it's going to be right next to you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're too close.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, I'm not. I have a crossbow feat.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: They won't see him maybe they won't--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Knocking that pillar down, as it stands there in the center of the field, you see now its--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (shouting) My door, my door!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It has these tiny little spines stuck into it, like it's been agitated and pushed to a point of absolute rage and anger. It's just roaring.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I-- I let my crossbow bolt go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, you release it?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Nope.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Because it's 11 o'clock.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Two spines in the side.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Dang it! I want to fight it right now!

lines.name: MARISHA, MATT
lines.text: I know.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I have no ki points.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh my God.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's going to be fun.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That is a huge thing.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter) My door!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's good times.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Aren't you glad you weren't standing there by yourself for that?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I mean--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Would have gotten two hits in.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You would have been fine.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're just as far away from the thing.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You get one.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, but there was two people standing next to that door.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, there was just Fjord.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: At one point there was Fjord and Caleb.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, he moved.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Caleb wussed out.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: MaTT: It's true. We're going to pick up next week at the start of this final round.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, god.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It would have been three rounds before I could do any damage. Before it killed him.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well you shouldn't have been that far away.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, my god.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, man. This is going to be fun.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Overestimating the value of surprise.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Once again thank you for D&D Beyond for being amazing, and all you guys for checking in. Have a wonderful week, and "Is it Thursday yet?" Good night.
